title: Ellis Island Part of Statue of Liberty National Monument: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Ellis Island Part of Statue of Liberty National Monument Ranger Guided Tour      Location: Information Desk, Ellis Island (Ground Floor) Fees: Free     Friday, August 12, 2016 Everyday  from 10/14/2015 to 10/14/2016 Check for today's program times and starting location, at the Information Desk, Ellis Island Main Building, Ground Floor. View Details            Join us for a ranger program! Daily tour schedule is posted at the Information Desk.  The program lasts approximately 30 - 35 minutes.  The unique experience explains the history of Ellis Island focusing on its use as an Immigration processing station but may also include other aspects of Ellis Island and Immigration History. Park Rangers will provide answers to many questions you may have. Perhaps you will have an opportunity to reflect upon what immigration means to you personally. Tours are free.
